name: My Caring Connection
tag_list: nursing-homes, assisted-living, independent-living, home-health, hospice-services, seniors, consulting, healthcare, health-care
overview:
My Caring Connection provides free assistance for assisted living and eldercare services to seniors and families in need. My Caring connection provides seniors and families with face to face guidance and assistance.

My Caring Connection advisor help seniors and their families make informed decisions about their eldercare options. These options specializing in nursing homes, assisted living, independent living, home health and hospice services. This personalized service is offered face to face at no charge to families, as the care communities reimburse the company for its services.
